title: Taric Rework?
body: Does anyone know anything more about this i thought it was ment to come out before the new champion.

replies.body:
> "Taric's almost certainly going to be the next full relaunch released. Exact timing's not completely certain yet, odds are good he'll be after the next new champion (after Jhin), but before the new champion after that." - Riot Meddler

So after Aurelion Sol but before the Mage Update (coming in june/july). So probably end of April or early May if things don't go wrong.
yeah i know just annoying but o well not much can be done ill just have to be patient
Taric is confirmed scheduled for this year dw.

Last we heard Taric's rework was supposed to be before Shen and was meant to be on the scale of Sion/Poppy.

Likely something went wrong and typical Riot Games fashion we wont hear anything until it's fully canceled or they have something shiny to distract us with.
Yes, but yorick's rework was meant to be a few years ago, or at least that's when they started discussing it. It's now scheduled for the rework after the mage update.
Full rework not needed and would be truly outrageous
I just want to be able to play taric without the fear of getting nothing done in a teamfight his just super fab
Man I love Taric just the way he is! If they take any of the gay away I will cry.
